```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
```

```{r}
weather_df = 
  read_csv("./data/weather_df.csv")

weather_df
```

## Remember this plot?
```{r}
weather_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x=tmin,y=tmax,color=name))+
  geom_point(alpha=.3)
```

##labs
```{r}
weather_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x=tmin,y=tmax,color=name))+
  geom_point(alpha=.3)+
  labs(
    title="Temperature plot",
    x="Minimum daily temperature(C)",
    y="Maximum daily temperature(C)",
    caption="Data from rnovaa package; temperatures in 2017."
  )
```
